DEMO_404_MSG_010: ̂Goodness, gracious... for this to happen, again...!
DEMO_404_MSG_020:
̂Wait... are you sure about this, Mister!? 
You really wanna go through with this!?
DEMO_404_MSG_100: ̂It's perfect! You're a natural, Mister! Heck, I don't even remember what you used to look like!
DEMO_404_MSG_030:
̂You must be planning on doing this to infiltrate the
Bastille and directly meet with Lucia!
ā
DEMO_404_MSG_110:
̂Alright then, ȁ... all that's left is for
you to hop into that sacrificial box.
ā
DEMO_404_MSG_040: ̂But, even so... Itaburu's going to immediately realize you aren't an Alloy Park resident, don't you think?
DEMO_404_MSG_120:
̂Once you're inside, Itaburu will come out and drag
you off into the Bastille.
DEMO_404_MSG_050:
̂Hmm, then perhaps let me make a disguise for you. 
That should fool that big pile of bricks.
DEMO_404_MSG_070:
̂Despite my appearance, ȁ, I'm fairly talented when it comes to sewing.
ā
DEMO_404_MSG_080:
̂If you can wait here for just a few moments, I'll bet
I can throw something together real quick to show you.
DEMO_404_MSG_090:
̂Alright... it's all finished! Well, I think I've outdone
myself! Wouldn't you say so, too, ȁ!?
